section.name: Release notes
section.p: These are the release notes for Commons CLI 1.3.1.
section.source:
INTRODUCTION:
This document contains the release notes for this version of the Commons CLI package. Commons CLI provides a simple API for working with the command line arguments and options.
Commons CLI 1.3.1 is a bug fix release and binary compatible with the previous versions, except for the OptionValidator class that is no longer public (change introduced in v1.2). Commons CLI 1.3.1 at least requires Java 5.0.
More information can be found on the project site at https://commons.apache.org/cli.
BUG FIXES =========
o CLI-252: LongOpt falsely detected as ambiguous. Thanks to Simon Harrer.
